com.cloudpos.card

Interface SLE4442Card

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Card, MemoryCard

    public interface SLE4442Card
extends MemoryCard
    Its' both the smartcard and the memory card.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MEMORY_CARD_AREA_MAIN
      Main data area of memory card
      static int MEMORY_CARD_AREA_PROTECTED
      Manufacture of memory card
      static int MEMORY_CARD_AREA_SECURITY
      Security data storage of memory card.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        ATR connect()
            throws DeviceException
        Applies power to the smart card reader slot, performing a cold reset.

        Calling this method when the slot power is off will normally reset the card, resulting in the transmission of an ATR by the card in the slot.

        Returns:
        ATR
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
                throws DeviceException
        Removes power from the smart card reader slot.

        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • verify

        boolean verify(byte[] key)
               throws DeviceException
        Authenticates the card with key.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        true Authenticates success. false Authenticates fail.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • read

        byte[] read(int area,
          int address,
          int length)
            throws DeviceException
        Reads data.
        Parameters:
        area - the read area defined in the constants:
        MEMORY_CARD_AREA_MAIN
        MEMORY_CARD_AREA_PROTECTED
        MEMORY_CARD_AREA_SECURITY
        address - from 0
        length - data length
        Returns:
        data content
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.

      • write

        void write(int area,
         int address,
         byte[] data)
           throws DeviceException
        Writes data.
        Parameters:
        area - the write area defined in the constants:
        MEMORY_CARD_AREA_MAIN
        MEMORY_CARD_AREA_PROTECTED
        MEMORY_CARD_AREA_SECURITY
        address - from 0
        data - write data
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.
